definition: to think up every possible method (idiom); to devise ways and means/to try this, that and the other
to think/to believe/to suppose/to wish/to want/to miss (feel wistful about the absence of sb or sth)

square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter
to set up/to arrange/to establish/to found/to display
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: Hillary Clinton in particular has gone out of her way to emphasise her support for faith-based social services.
sentences.chinese: 她想方設法地強調對宗教團體在社會服務方面的支持。

sentences.english: Today, they're angling for a one-microsecond edge.
sentences.chinese: 如今，他們連一微秒都要想方設法贏得。

sentences.english: Whowould want a warmonger that is always tries to invade other countries in his or her own back yard anyways?
sentences.chinese: 是誰總是在他國後院想方設法搞破壞呢？

sentences.english: He struggled to find a hobby, having burned out on reading.
sentences.chinese: 他讀書讀煩了，於是想方設法地尋找業餘愛好。

sentences.english: Still, Kane would try to circumvent her parents' efforts.
sentences.chinese: 有時候，凱恩會想方設法智取。

sentences.english: She uses different ways to improve our abilities in listening, speaking, reading and writing.
sentences.chinese: 他總是想方設法提高我們的聽說讀寫能力。

sentences.english: The wife is figuring out how to keep Chinese goods flowing through U.S. borders, as protectionism rears its head.
sentences.chinese: 妻子則正在想方設法讓中國的貨物穿過邊境流向美國。

sentences.english: He managed to get into college in spite of his bad grades.
sentences.chinese: 儘管他的考分很低，他還是想方設法進了大學。

sentences.english: All week we've looked at the keys to receiving God's blessing on our work.
sentences.chinese: 我們一週都在想方設法讓我們的工作蒙福。

sentences.english: But determined criminals are still managing to find other ways to steal cars.
sentences.chinese: 但是不死心的盜賊們卻還在一直想方設法偷車。

sentences.english: She sought to discern his inmost thoughts.
sentences.chinese: 她想方設法要了解他內心深處的想法。

sentences.english: Comments should try to remain the advantages of compositions to top students.
sentences.chinese: 評語寫作應想方設法永保優等生的作文“優勢”。

sentences.english: Li Tiantian tried to find the answer.
sentences.chinese: 李甜甜想方設法找到答案。

sentences.english: The animal cried piteously for hours as the farmer tried to figure out a way to get him out.
sentences.chinese: 驢子慘叫了幾個小時，農夫想方設法把他救出來。

sentences.english: As stakes rise, gamblers are demanding an edge.
sentences.chinese: 隨着賭注的升高，賭徒們也在想方設法求勝。

sentences.english: Harry is working hard to butter up the boss to get that promotion.
sentences.chinese: 哈里爲了被提升，正在想方設法地對老闆拍馬奉承。
